name: Complex URL Matcher
description: Matches all URLs, including Emails. It also matches http:// at the start, and at the end ? with whatever comes after it.
content:
gskinner.com
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=barcode=1202002390123
author: GalgoR12
